query:
-- Create case_studies table if it doesn't exist
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS case_studies (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  industry VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  industry_color VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL,
  logo_url TEXT,
  headline_stat VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  headline_label VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  one_line_summary TEXT NOT NULL,
  challenge TEXT NOT NULL,
  approach TEXT NOT NULL,
  tier2_summary TEXT,
  tier3_full TEXT,
  display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Insert The Florist Supply Shop case study
INSERT INTO case_studies (
  client_name,
  industry,
  industry_color,
  logo_url,
  headline_stat,
  headline_label,
  one_line_summary,
  challenge,
  approach,
  display_order,
  is_active
) VALUES (
  'The Florist Supply Shop',
  'E-commerce',
  '#10B981',
  'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663316492277/gaPoaXoXcrIBMkdT.png',
  '+95%',
  'Revenue Growth (YoY)',
  'Nearly doubled Shopify revenue through Meta + Google while cutting acquisition costs.',
  'The Florist Supply Shop needed to scale their Shopify store\'s revenue and order volume while maintaining — or ideally improving — the efficiency of their paid acquisition across Meta and Google.',
  'We strengthened measurement infrastructure to understand true channel performance, then refined targeting, creative, and bidding strategies across Meta and Google to scale conversions with better economics.',
  1,
  true
);
